critical_issues: Extremely small sample size (n=9) - insufficient for statistical inference

methodology_issues.description: Testing convergence using the same 7.55-point threshold used to define convergence
methodology_issues.impact: Results are tautological and lack independent validation

methodology_issues.description: Testing with artificial price levels around archaeological zones
methodology_issues.impact: Does not represent actual market conditions or real trading scenarios

methodology_issues.description: Only testing sessions where archaeological zones exist
methodology_issues.impact: Inflates success rate by excluding negative cases

critical_issues: Sample size (15) insufficient for reliable estimates (need ≥45)
Selection bias inflates apparent success rate

methodology_issues.impact: Cannot establish statistical significance with n=3

methodology_issues.description: Testing with predetermined mock price scenarios
methodology_issues.impact: Does not test actual market timing effectiveness

methodology_issues.description: No comparison with random timing or alternative methods
methodology_issues.impact: Cannot establish whether results exceed baseline

critical_issues: Mock scenarios cannot validate real market timing
No control group for baseline comparison

scoring_issues.description: Component scores based on insufficient/flawed testing
scoring_issues.impact: Weighted average of invalid inputs produces invalid result
Weighting bias can artificially inflate/deflate scores
Cannot assess reliability of overall score

critical_issues: All component scores based on flawed methodology
Insufficient statistical validation for any component

key_findings: Insufficient sample sizes across all components
No proper control groups or baseline comparisons
Overall framework score not statistically meaningful
recommendations: Collect minimum 30 samples per component for statistical validity
Implement proper control groups and baseline comparisons
Use real market data instead of synthetic scenarios
Eliminate circular logic in testing methodologies
Calculate confidence intervals for all estimates
Defer production deployment until statistical validation complete
